statements: SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, last_updated FROM product_inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_inventory;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, stock_quantity ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM product_inventory WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM product_inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_updates WHERE update_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level < 5;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT product_name, update_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN stock_updates s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT product_name, update_time, update_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN stock_updates s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE update_quantity < 0;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, update_time, update_quantity FROM products p INNER JOIN stock_updates s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE update_time > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT order_id, order_quantity, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT product_id, new_stock_level FROM stock_updates;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, new_stock_level, update_timestamp FROM products INNER JOIN stock_updates ON products.product_id = stock_updates.product_id WHERE update_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stock_updates WHERE new_stock_level < 50 ORDER BY update_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, quantity_sold FROM customers JOIN sales ON customers.customer_id = sales.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level, order_date FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;

SELECT sales.sale_id, customers.customer_name, orders.order_id, sales.quantity_sold FROM sales JOIN customers ON sales.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN orders ON sales.order_id = orders.order_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level > 100;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level < 20 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category_name FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.product_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.product_id = suppliers.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
